mapper.sql: id, proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createdBy, creationDate, modifyDate, modifyBy, companyLicPicPath, orgCodePicPath

where 1=1
and proName like CONCAT('%',#{pro.proname},'%')
and proContact like CONCAT('%',#{pro.procontact},'%')
